webcrawler

Class TermsCounter

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.concurrent.ForkJoinTask<Void>
      • java.util.concurrent.RecursiveAction
        • webcrawler.SpiderMan
          • webcrawler.TermsCounter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Future<Void>, WebCrawler

    public final class TermsCounter
extends SpiderMan
    Uses SpiderMan WebcCrawler to get term counts from a web site.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
